name: Travelog
description: A documentary arranged around a journey. This template lets you organise shots by location and shooting day and identify subjects and a presenter if necessary.

shot_types.name: Presenter Closeup
shot_types.description: A shot of %%presenter%%.  Make their face fill the frame

shot_types.name: Subject Closeup
shot_types.description: A shot of %%subject%%. Make their face fill the frame

shot_types.name: Presenter Medium
shot_types.description: A shot of %%presenter%%.  Frame them from head to waist

shot_types.name: Subject Medium
shot_types.description: A shot of %%subject%%. Frame them from head to waist

shot_types.name: Presenter doing something medium
shot_types.description: A shot of %%presenter%% holding something.  Frame them from head to waist

shot_types.name: Subject doing something medium
shot_types.description: A shot of %%subject%% holding something. Frame them from head to waist

shot_types.name: Presenter OTS shot medium
shot_types.description: Following %%presenter%% as they walk. Frame them from head to waist

shot_types.name: Subject OTS shot Medium
shot_types.description: Following the %%subject%% as they walk. Frame them from head to waist

shot_types.name: Presenter Reverse Medium
shot_types.description: A shot of %%presenter%% over their shoulder, holding something

shot_types.name: Subject Reverse Medium
shot_types.description: A shot of %name% over their shoulder, holding something

shot_types.name: Presenter OTS shot wide
shot_types.description: Shoot %%presenter%% walking away. Frame them from head to foot

shot_types.name: Subject OTS shot wide
shot_types.description: Shoot %%subject%% walking away. Frame them from head to foot

shot_types.name: Presenter in interview, closeup
shot_types.description: A shot of %%presenter%% from over %%subject%%'s shoulder.  Make their face fill the frame

shot_types.name: Presenter in interview, medium
shot_types.description: A shot of %%presenter%% from over %%subject%%'s shoulder. Make them fill the frame, head to waist

shot_types.name: Subject in interview, closeup
shot_types.description: A shot of %%subject%% from over %%presenter%%'s shoulder.  Make their face fill the frame

shot_types.name: Subject in interview, medium
shot_types.description: A shot of %%presenter%% from over %%subject%%'s shoulder.  Make them fill the frame, head to waist

shot_types.name: Vehicle moving towards camera long
shot_types.description: A shot of a vehicle moving towards the camera from some way off

shot_types.name: Vehicle from other vehicle wide
shot_types.description: A shot of the front of a vehicle in motion, shot from another vehicle

shot_types.name: Vehicle moving away from camera long
shot_types.description: A shot of a vehicle moving away from the camera from some way off

shot_types.name: Vehicle from other vehicle wide
shot_types.description: A shot of the rear of a vehicle in motion, shot from another vehicle

shot_types.name: Landscape detail
shot_types.description: A still shot of an interesting detail in the landscape

shot_types.name: Landscape passing by detail
shot_types.description: A shot of an interesting detail passing by from a vehicle

shot_types.name: Landscape static
shot_types.description: A wide shot of the landscape

shot_types.name: Landscape passing by
shot_types.description: A wide shot of the landscape passing by from a vehicle

shot_types.name: Interior detail
shot_types.description: An interesting interior detail

shot_types.name: Interior wide
shot_types.description: A wide shot of an interior

shot_types.name: Crowd of subjects medium
shot_types.description: A crowd of subjects, framed from head to waist

shot_types.name: Crowd of subjects wide
shot_types.description: A crowd of subjects, framed from head to foot

shot_types.name: Group of subjects medium
shot_types.description: A group of subjects, framed from head to waist

shot_types.name: Group of subjects wide
shot_types.description: A group of subjects, framed from head to foot

shot_types.name: Landmark wide
shot_types.description: %%landmark%% framed to fill the frame

roles.description: The first location in the journey
